word:
"Work out your own salvation with," --a pompous, overbearing, dictatorial spirit? If this is to be a doer of the word, many connected with our institutions will receive 
                                                                           1308
a reward. But the word of the Lord is, "Work out your own salvation with fear and trembling; for it is God that worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure." "The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, long-suffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, meekness, temperance; against such there is no law. And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts. If we live in the Spirit, let us walk (work) in the Spirit. Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another."
